scripts.compile-old: rm -fr dist/* && node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel.js --presets es2015,stage-0 --plugins add-module-exports -d dist/ src/
scripts.build: rm -fr dist/* && node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel.js src -d dist --presets es2015,stage-0 --no-babelrc
scripts.install-old: rm -fr dist/* && ../babel-cli/bin/babel.js --presets es2015,stage-0 --plugins add-module-exports -d dist/ src/
scripts.install-x: rm -fr dist/* && node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel.js --presets es2015,stage-0 --plugins add-module-exports -d dist/ src/
